scenario_text.value: *cough* *cough* *cough*...! *gasp* *pant*...
Saki... Um, you okay?

Oh yeah, feeling like a million buck—*cough*!
*cough* *cough*!

Was this too much? Should we go back to the
school?

Maybe we should head back... You don’t look
too good.
No, I’m fine, I tell yo—

*cough*! *cough* *cough*! Unngh...
*huff* *puff*...

What an awful cough... There’s no way you’re
fine!
Ahaha... Did I surprise you? Sorry, sorry...

But really... I’m fine. It’s been this way
ever since I was little...

Seriously, let’s go back to the school. I’ll
be worried otherwise.
Yeah, what he said! C’mon, can we?
Mmm... All right...

Here, let me help you up. Ready? On three.
One... Two...
Oh no... Not an attack! Not now!
This is bad... *cough* *cough* *cough*...!!!
Saki!!!

(This is a nightmare! What am I supposed to
do?!)
Takuma, take Saki and run!
Floramon...? What’re you saying?!

Go, and leave you behind?! I can’t—*cough*...
*cough* *cough*!

Enough, already! Instead of me, you should be
worrying about yourself!
Saki... I’ll protect you, I promise!
Floramon!
Now... I’ll deal with this, you get moving!
